issue.title: Client relies on ~/factory/light to know about light insertions

content.raw:
I fixed the conflicts on pull request #2608 and removed the factory publisher I had added there. As @iche033 mentioned, it is now being published from somewhere else, so I moved the mention of this issue there 72629c6.

I don't think the issue is fixed, we just have the same band-aid we had before.
content.html:
I fixed the conflicts on pull request #2608 and removed the factory publisher I had added there. As @iche033 mentioned, it is now being published from somewhere else, so I moved the mention of this issue there 72629c6.

I don't think the issue is fixed, we just have the same band-aid we had before.
